AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country where the federal district court is located
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Moore, Texas: location where the border patrol agents were sitting, near Interstate Highway 35 and approximately 115 miles from the Mexican border
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Interstate Highway 35: highway where the incident occurred, with northbound lanes where a pickup truck camper was spotted
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Mexican border: physical boundary relevant to legality of investigatory stop and location near the incident
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.truck cab: front part of the truck where three females were seated
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.back seat of the truck: rear part of the truck cab where five or six men were seated
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.floor of the camper: area where fourteen additional males were found lying down
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.pickup truck camper: compartment of the vehicle where evidence was found and is relevant to the suppression motion
